**The Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences: Oral Instructions on Ingesting the Radiant Flower of the Sun and Moon**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences: Oral Instructions on Ingesting the Radiant Flower of the Sun and Moon*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. Originally part of *The Oral Instructions on the Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences*, later separated into an independent text. One scroll. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Section Zheng Yi.

---

The Great Emperor of Fusang received the transmission of this scripture from the Four Perfected Ones of the Great Ultimate, who consulted the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise. The Queen Mother addressed the Great Emperor, saying:

"In the era of the Supreme August, those who studied and beheld the treasure scriptures, ascending to the Jade Purity Heaven, all achieved this through the secret cultivation of the precious Dao and the concealment of its numinous mysteries—unspoken by mouth, unmanifest in form, silently resonating with the utmost stillness to attain the Perfected Ones above. Thus, the Dao values concealment and stillness, transforming without form, emerging without sound.

Since I received the true scripture from the Nine Void-Heavens, countless eons have passed, yet it has been transmitted to fewer than three. By the end of the Central August Prime, it was inscribed in the nation of Luona within the Northern Prime Heaven, upon the Lingjing Mountain of the Bird of Renown in the Jialai Grotto, within the Numinous Palace. There, the qi of the Nine Mysteries and the Orthodox Unity congealed into characters.

Later, the Sage Lord of the Nine Mysteries and Golden Portal beheld the numinous text and commanded the Immortal Capital to transcribe it with a covenant sworn to Heaven. Through cultivation, he attained the Dao and ascended to the Golden Portal. The Most High, deeming me reckless in divulging celestial treasures, stripped me of my true primordial title and demoted me to a wandering spirit-official. Only after five hundred years was I restored to my original perfection.

Thus, the Primordial Beginning established the Four Offices and the Five Thearchs’ palaces, deploying divine soldiers precisely to inspect leaks and punish with the Wind Blade. How could one not be cautious?

Later disciples flourished like a forest, yet not one attained immortality. Why? All suffered from revealing the scriptural texts, scattering the celestial perfected ones. The Dao ceased to descend, and heavenly punishments silently manifested. Advancing or retreating, they lost their resolve, perishing alone in empty mountains—laboring in vain, their regret beyond words.

The Dao does not reveal itself without diligence, nor does it flourish without secrecy. Those who behold the true scriptures must cultivate in secret to seek the numinous. The divine and the perfected respond readily, and ascension to immortality may be calculated by days.

Consider the Four Poles Perfected Ones: they mastered myriad precepts, treasured the Dao, and concealed its mysteries. Firmly grasping the numinous charts, their spirit and will stood resolute. Their names were inscribed in the Upper Clarity, their characters recorded in the Emperor’s Register. They ascended to the Four Poles—what doubt remains in receiving this transmission?

Thereupon, the Great Emperor transmitted *The Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences* in accordance with the covenant.

The Lord of the Western City now seals one copy within the Emei Mountains, in the secluded chamber.

The mysterious text of *The Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences* was born within the Great Void, manifesting upon the Western Tortoise Mountain, above the Mystic Garden, in the shade of the Accumulated Stones, within the Golden Hall and Jade Chamber. The Eight Pure Essences’ lofty and mysterious feathered chapters, their numinous texts dense as cavern peaks, their purple characters gleaming like a forest of jade, their divine radiance flowing through the Nine Primes, their golden tones resonating in the Purple Heaven, crimson auroras veiling the Jade Chamber, soaring mists surging in the congealed perfection—purple phoenixes flapping their wings, numinous winds wafting incense, fragrant qi streaming, penetrating the subtle to enter the mysterious. To the left, the spontaneous Golden Lads revolve; to the right, the Supreme Void Immortals are summoned. Divine consorts attend, the Great Flower holds the towel, Jade Lads assist in rank, the Four Offices approach the hall, the Two Effulgences pause their brilliance, the Three Dawns return their essence. Flying immortals gallop in turn, streaming luminosities encamp like clouds, radiant flowers intermingle, the Three Candles merge their light. The majesty of the text blazes, qi spreads through the Purple Court. The assembled perfected ones feast and offer rites, celebrating the Upper Clarity. This is the supreme of numinous texts, its virtue towering and lofty above the high spirits.

Thereupon, the Most High Jade Dawn Supreme Lord of the Great Dao fasted in the Upper Palace, swore a covenant to the Purple Gold Heaven, and received it from the Nine Mysteries. He gathered the Yellow Flower from the Eastern Well, plucked the Sun Root at the Golden Gate, revolved the Two Effulgences to infuse the mysterious, absorbed the flying essence to illuminate his countenance. Drawing the Great Void as his term, he matched the Three Luminaries in longevity, his celestial title exalted in the Most High, his purple record compiled in the Jade Dawn. He governed the myriad offices in the Emperor’s Chart, presided over the Jade Thearch among the Upper Immortals, ingested the Eight Pure Essences from the sun and moon, recited the jade chapters to revolve his spirit, and awaited the numinous perfected ones for his own delight. The scripture remained untransmitted for ten thousand eons.

This Dao is the wondrous method of soaring through empty space and treading the void to transcend the Upper Perfected. It should be transmitted only to those with the bone-record of attainment, destined to become Perfected Ones.

Among the millions of aspiring immortals, not one has glimpsed its chapters. The Golden Portal of Heaven, the Azure Mansion of the Square Cauldron, and the Earthly Palaces all inscribe their registers in reverse before birth—only then may one receive the true scripture.

Those who obtain it immediately become Upper Perfected Ones and the patriarchs of the ten thousand immortals.

The Primordial Beginning transmitted the scripture to the Most High Jade Thearch, the Nine Heavenly Thearchs, and the Nine Heavenly Elders in the Empty Mystery, displaying it upon the Western Tortoise Mountain and mystically bestowing it upon the Queen Mother of the West. The Supreme Lord of the Great Dao received it from the Nine Mysteries and transmitted it to the Great Emperor Lord of Fusang. The Golden Portal Thearch received it from the Northern Prime and transmitted it to the Prime Minister Lord Azure Lad. The Great Emperor transmitted it to the Four Poles Perfected Ones.

The Dao of the Mystic Antiquity is transmitted from qi to qi, from perfection to perfection.

The Prime Minister compiled and edited the numinous text, concealing it in the Great Existence Palace above the Nine Heavens, guarded by seven hundred Jade Lads and Jade Maidens. According to the statutes, after seven hundred years, a Perfected One may receive its transmission. The Four Offices, with the Five Thearchs’ divine soldiers—seven hundred in number—punish leaks and divulgence.

Those who obtain this scripture and recklessly transmit it without following the statutes will have their seven ancestors held accountable, and their own bodies will perish in the Nine Springs.

The essence of the sun is red, round in form yet square in its luminous trace. Its qi waxes and wanes, its revolutions subtly diminish. Always, on the third, ninth, seventeenth, twenty-first, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month—five times monthly—atop the Golden Gate, refine the Eight Rays of the Sun’s Soul and Radiant Essence with the Golden Essence, Stone Luminous Water, and the Mother of Mushroom Flowers."

On this day, the sun’s radiance scatters, its flying roots pour forth in torrents, and golden essence overflows, moistening all under heaven. Those who seek immortality must, on this day, gather and ingest the sun’s root. The numinous descends to the Jade Portal, essence fills the hidden passes, the body generates wondrous light, and one’s years become equal to the sun’s. Following this Way in secret, one ascends to the Golden Gate. The Golden Gate lies within the Western Pass of Heaven, the portal through which sun and moon commune with the numinous. The Thearch is named *Red Cinnabar, Golden Essence, Stone Radiance, Water Mother*—the Scripture of the Jade Womb.

The moon’s light is yellow, its qi square in essence yet round in form, revolving and waxing, its cycles complete yet ever-declining. Always on the fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month, pass above the Eastern Well, bathe in the numinous radiance, refine and adorn the essence’s brilliance, and make resplendent the imperial splendor. On this day, yang essence scatters, yellow qi coils within, imperial splendor overflows, and all under heaven receives the true. Those who seek immortality must, on this day, gather the yellow radiance above the Eastern Well, ingest the yang essence from the sun’s soul, and let it flow through the nine apertures, while the spirit guards the five palaces of the viscera. Cultivating this Way, one ascends to the Moon’s Court. The Moon’s Soul resides within the Eastern Well, the portal through which sun and moon share their radiance. The Thearch is named *Yellow Qi, Yang Essence, Hidden Heaven, Concealed Moon*—the Scripture of the Jade Embryo.

For the Way of gathering the sun’s radiance and flying roots, one day prior, purify the body, burn incense, draw nine *dou* of well-flower water, and expose it in the central courtyard. Inscribe the *Ninefold-Refined Stone Radiance, Water Mother, Jade Talisman* and place it in the water. Face west, knock the teeth twelve times, and softly intone the prayer:

*"Yang brightness refines essence,
Light illumines the Purple Court,
Eight rays shine resplendent,
Soul-mushrooms overflow.
Five revolutions, three transformations,
Qi connects with the Great Numinous.
Fragrance flows in winding streams,
Shading and moistening the living.
Adorned with the Golden Gate’s sash,
Flying roots glow fresh.
Ingesting Stone Radiance,
Water Mother irrigates essence.
Following heaven’s revolutions,
Accord with the sun’s splendor.
Nine apertures receive the true,
Liberating the original form."*

Afterward, leave the water exposed in the courtyard overnight. At noon the next day, take one *sheng* of the dew-water, face the sun, and ingest it. Knock the teeth twenty-four times, look up to the sun, and pray:

*"Yang essence now flows,
Flying radiance renewed.
Imperial mushrooms overflow,
Shade coils within.
Gazing upward, I feast on dark moisture,
Fragrant splendor arrives.
Palaces and chambers open wide,
Washing away dust and clamor.
The body reflects jade’s light,
The face emits golden truth.
Clouds soar on feathered steps,
Ascending to the Sun’s Gate."*

Afterward, face upward and draw in the sun’s essence forty-five times. Bathe the entire body with the remaining water, then return to the chamber. Face west, knock the teeth twenty-four times, close the eyes, and visualize five-colored streaming clouds descending to encircle the body. Within the five-colored clouds, a purple qi, large as an eye’s pupil, appears in layers of dozens of circles, gleaming amid the five hues. Together with the five qi, it descends and enters the adept’s mouth. Draw in the qi forty-five times, then swallow saliva nine times, and softly intone:

*"Sun’s soul scatters light,
Five colors pour in torrents.
Refining the soul at the Golden Gate,
The round radiance towers.
Numinous brilliance spills forth,
Receiving brightness from the Celestial River.
Jade mushrooms overflow,
Orchid moisture fragrant and sweet.
I drink the imperial spring,
Nurse the flying radiance.
Plucking roots, swallowing fruit,
Lifespan matches the numinous tree.
Form clings to the great radiance,
Body soars on flying clouds.
For a thousand ages, ten thousand kalpas,
Let it never falter or err."*

Afterward, bow nine times toward the Sun’s Gate. This is the Way of gathering the sun’s root, flying radiance, and the Great Yang’s essence—a wondrous and ancient Dao. Practicing it for one year, the face gains jade’s luster, and the body emits golden light. After seven years, the numinous descends, and one flies to the Sun’s Gate, where the Sun Youth speaks with the adept. Without one’s name inscribed in the Thearch’s register, written in green characters in the Azure Palace, one may not behold its chapters. To recklessly divulge this numinous text is to hold one’s nine ancestors accountable, while one’s own body suffers transgressions, enduring the Three Calamities, Five Sufferings, and ten thousand kalpas of irredeemable torment.

The *Ninefold-Refined Stone Radiance, Water Mother, Jade Talisman* is to be written in cinnabar on blue-green paper and placed in the water. On the day of practice, write it entirely in cinnabar on blue-green paper, face west, and ingest one talisman. In practicing this Way, avoid defilement and the five pungent vegetables, ensuring the five viscera remain pure and fragrant to receive the true numinous. If the sky is overcast and the sun absent, perform the practice indoors.

For the Way of gathering the moon’s imperial radiance, on the day the moon passes the Eastern Well, at dawn draw one jar of well-flower water and expose it in the central courtyard. At midnight, inscribe the *Yang Essence, Jade Embryo, Refined Immortal Talisman* and place it in the water. Face east, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and pray over the water:

*"Yellow qi, yin radiance,
Yang essence gleams bright.
Bathing the nine souls,
Adorned with the Golden Dawn’s sash.
Round brightness reveals,
Jade embryo refines immortals.
Radiance intertwines,
Fragrance washes the ford.
Nine yangs transform as one,
Dark clouds scatter mist.
Primal radiance returns the numinous,
Winding light reflects my form.
Ascending to the Upper Palace,
Gazing upon the jade pavilion."*

Afterward, take one *sheng* of the water, face the moon, and ingest it. Clench the fists, visualize the moon’s five-colored streaming essence descending to crown and encircle the body. Within the five colors, a moon’s yellow qi, large as an eye’s pupil, appears in layers of dozens, amid the moon’s five-colored essence, and enters the Grotto Chamber through the mouth, encircling the five viscera. Face the moon and swallow its essence fifty times, then swallow saliva ten times. Knock the teeth ten times and softly intone:

*"Yellow qi flows essence,
Threefold harmony congeals light.
Dark radiance returns to rectitude,
Adorned with eight rays.
Refining the soul at the Eastern Well,
Receiving brightness from the flying emperor.
Golden radiance scatters the numinous,
Five lords stream fragrance.
The Lady descends with sweet wine,
Moistening the ten directions.
Mighty mushrooms pour down,
Six palaces brim full.
Golden essence ninefold transforms,
Changing scenes, altering countenance.
Riding emptiness, descending mist,
Roaming the Great Void.
Ascending to the Moon’s Court,
Paired with the true in dual radiance.
Transforming through the eight paths,
Exiting existence, entering non-being.
Two dawns share brilliance,
Eternally preserved without end."*

When finished, rinse with the remaining water. After bathing, return to the chamber and face east to ingest the Yang Essence Jade Womb Refinement Immortal Talisman. Then knock the teeth twelve times and softly intone:

*"The hidden heavens embrace radiance,
Yellow qi thickly disperses.
Essence congeals, luminous splendor,
Eight rays gleam resplendent.
Lustrous adornments of yellow blossoms,
Stone reflections wash and irrigate.
Jade mushrooms overflow,
Moistening and filling the celestial vastness.
All under heaven receives refinement,
Dawn breaks at the morning’s first light.
Mounting the radiance, ascending the void,
Attaining the ascent to the imperial palace.
The Eternal Fire descends to the world,
Transcending the eight perils,
Sharing brilliance with the moon,
Equal in rank with the moon."*

When done, swallow qi fifty times and stop.

This is the Way of Ingesting Moonlight, the wondrous method of the Primordial Beginning. Practicing it for one year, the face will bear the luster of jade. After seven years, the numinous descends, and the body emits golden light. After nine years, one will fly and ascend to the moon’s realm, where the Moon Lad and the Five Lords, along with the Lady, will roam together with you. Without one’s name inscribed on the imperial register of the Upper Clarity, one may not partake in these mysteries. Those who practice this method may attain transcendence as an immortal. Revealing this sacred text lightly will bring seven generations of ancestors to account, and one’s own body will be consigned to the ghostly officials, forever sealed in the earthly prisons, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas.

The Yang Essence Jade Womb Refinement Immortal Talisman is written in yellow on white paper and placed in water. On the day of practice, all is written in yellow, and one faces east to ingest one talisman. If the sky is overcast and the moon is absent, practice may still be performed indoors. Missing a single day of practice will nullify a hundred days of prior effort.

For all scholars of the highest arts who gather the flying blossoms of the sun and moon: at evening repose, knock the teeth thirty-six times, clench the fists, close the eyes in darkness, and visualize the purple radiance of the sun above the left eye and the yellow qi of the moon above the right eye, shimmering and flickering, illuminating the realm of the head and face. Softly intone:

*"Dual radiance flows essence,
Light reflects my form.
Flying blossoms, imperial mushrooms,
Sweet fragrance fills and abounds.
Above, it crowns the Muddy Pellet,
Below, it spreads through the Yellow Court.
The Three Lights merge,
The Two Qi intertwine.
Eternally preserve the Crimson Palace,
Reverse aging and renew life,
Live as long as the sun and moon,
Equal in age to ten thousand kalpas."*

When finished, practicing this consistently for one year will cause the Director of Destinies in the sun and the Five Stars in the moon to descend with the radiance of true numinosity and the blossoms of the flying emperor, bestowing them upon your body. Your face will take on a golden countenance, and your head will emit purple light. After nine years of unwavering practice, you will fly through the Great Void.

This most wondrous Way must not be transmitted to the unworthy.

For those cultivating the highest Way of ingesting the imperial blossoms of the sun and moon, on the days of the Grand Year’s ruling star, one’s life star, and the eight solar terms, write the Eight Pure Jade Talismans of the Two Radiant Essences of the Sun and Moon on bamboo membrane, facing the proper direction for each term, and ingest them at dawn. These talismans emerge from the Nine Orifices, shining upon the Western Tortoise Mountain, above the Dark Garden, and beneath the Accumulated Stones. The Queen Mother received them from the Nine Mysteries to draw in the essence of the flying blossoms of the Two Radiant Essences.

Thus, the Three Primordial Lords of Grand Simplicity, the Upper Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen, and the Perfected of Grand Void all practiced this Way, ascending to the rank of Highest Primordial Emperor, inscribed on the Purple Tablets of Jade Clarity, and attaining the numinous perfection of Grand Truth. This method is most wondrous and must not be transmitted to the lower world. Those who obtain it will fly through the mysterious void, ascend to the Gate of the Sun, and roam the Court of the Moon, their lifespan equal to the Two Radiant Essences, enduring as long as qi itself. Revealing this sacred text lightly will bring seven generations of ancestors to account, and one’s own body will bear the guilt, forever sealed among the ghostly officials.

The bamboo membrane is hollow and empty, connecting above to the qi of the Eight Pure Mysterious Radiance. The light of the Two Radiant Essences of the sun and moon flows and reflects upon it, thus the flying essence shines upon the bamboo membrane.

Performing the rites of the Feminine Unity Jade Seal, the Mysterious Mother’s Eight Gates of Practice, the Twelve Upper Aspirations, and the offering of qi to the numinous realm in the Way of seeking immortality—without these talismans, the numinous will not descend, qi will not alight, the Way will recede into the distance, and transcendence will never be attained.

The Yang Essence Flying Radiance Talisman: On the day of the Grand Year, write in vermilion on bamboo membrane, face the Grand Year, and ingest it. After three years, the stomach duct will become luminous, filled with true radiance, the numinous will descend to the Jade Chamber, and the face will daily emit sunlight. After seven years, one will fly and ascend to the Gate of the Sun.

The Yin Essence Flying Radiance Jade Talisman: On the day of the Grand Year, write in yellow on bamboo membrane, face the Grand Year, and ingest it. After three years, flowing light will shine downward, illuminating the six viscera, the five organs will become luminous, and the face will bear jade light. After nine years, one will fly and ascend to the Court of the Moon.

The Flying Blossom Sun Radiance Jade Womb Numinous Talisman: On the day of one’s life star, write in vermilion on bamboo membrane, face one’s life star, and ingest it. After three years, flowing essence and purple light will illuminate the body, and the face will take on a golden countenance. After nine years, one will fly through the Great Void and ascend to the Gate of the Sun.

The Imperial Blossom Stone Radiance Inner Transformation Numinous Talisman: On the day of one’s life star, write in blue-green on bamboo membrane, face one’s life star, and ingest it. After three years, a halo of light will appear around the neck, illuminating a league in all directions. After nine years, one will converse with the Lady of the Moon, fly through the Great Void, and ascend to the Court of the Moon.

The Eight Pure Flying Essence Jade Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Spring, write in blue-green on bamboo membrane, face the true northeast, and ingest it. After one year, the nine orifices will become luminous. After three years, the divine blossoms will shine within. After nine years, one will unite with the Perfected in numinosity and fly to the Upper Clarity. It is also called the Celestial Luminaries of the Seven Primes.

The Seven Pure Flying Essence Spirit-Transforming Inner Talisman: On the day of the Spring Equinox, write in blue-green on bamboo membrane, face the true east, and ingest it. After one year, the spirits within the five organs will transform into Perfected Ones. After seven years, they will manifest and serve as your envoys. After nine years, inner and outer will be luminously interconnected, allowing you to see within yourself, to sit in death and stand in disappearance, and to fly as an immortal. It is also called the Jade Script of the Nine Phoenixes.

The Six Pure Flying Essence Numinous Communion Jade Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Summer, write in vermilion on bamboo membrane, face the true southeast at dawn, and ingest it. After one year, the Lad of the Sun will manifest. After three years, you will converse with him in spirit and form. After nine years, the Perfected of the Nine Orifices will bestow upon you the true scriptures, allowing you to transform in the eight directions, to sit in death and stand in disappearance, and to fly to the Upper Clarity.

The Nine Heavens Dragon-Tiger Chapter.

Fivefold Pure Flying Essence Cavern-Heaven Numinous Talisman: On the day of the Summer Solstice, write in vermilion on bamboo membrane, face due south at dawn, and ingest it. After one year, you will see clearly for ten *li*. After three years, you will naturally know the transformations of spirit. After nine years, you will gaze through the Nine Heavens, pay homage to the Nine Heavenly Kings, converse with the numinous, and fly through the Nine Heavens. Also called the Nine Numinous Jade Script.

Fourfold Pure Flying Essence Jade Womb of Immortal Embryo Golden Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Autumn, write in yellow on bamboo membrane, face the southwest at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, blood and marrow will congeal and transform, and the nine orifices will receive the true. After seven years, your form will change, and your countenance will gleam like golden light. After nine years, you will descend to the Flying Clouds, ride the void, and ascend to the Gate of the Sun. Also called the Golden Light Jade Perfection.

Threefold Pure Flying Essence Summoning Immortal Upper Talisman: On the day of the Autumnal Equinox, write in yellow on bamboo membrane, face due west at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, the immortal officials of the Five Marchmounts will arrive, and the perfected forms of the upper adepts will appear. Middle adepts will see them as misty and indistinct, now present, now gone. Lower adepts will perceive them in dreams. You will converse with the immortals. After nine years, the immortal officials will send cloud chariots to welcome you, and you will ascend to the Moon’s Court. Also called the Comprehensive Record of the Primordial Heaven.

Twofold Pure Flying Essence Nine Orifices Stone Radiance Jade Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Winter, write in black on bamboo membrane, face the northwest at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, you will be able to read in darkness, your eyes will be luminous and spiritually attuned, and you will see and converse with spirits. After nine years, the mysterious radiance of the sun and moon will arise within your five viscera, your entire body will shine with light, you will ride the void and fly, and your lifespan will equal that of the sun. Also called the Mysterious Radiance Spontaneous Golden Numinosity.

Onefold Pure Flying Essence Yellow Qi Ascending Heaven Numinous Talisman: On the day of the Winter Solstice, write in black on bamboo membrane, face due north at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, you will understand the speech of the people of the Nine Heavens. After nine years, you will share a chariot with the Eight Purities, roam the Great Empyrean, and feast in the radiance of the Jade Dawn. Also called the Threefold Radiance Mysterious Essence Golden Splendor.

The above Eightfold Pure Flying Essence Twofold Radiance Jade Scripts are born within the Cavernous Void, luminous atop Tortoise Mountain’s peak, above the Dark Garden, and in the shade of the Accumulated Stones. They are the origin of the ten thousand *qi*, governing all the hidden scripts of the heavens, sun, and moon, and are concealed above the Nine Heavens, transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who obtain these numinous scripts will share the lifespan of the sun and moon, transform and roam at will, emerge from being and enter non-being, their necks radiating purple light, their faces emitting golden countenances. The ten thousand spirits will bow in reverence, and the officials of the Ten Heavens will welcome them. After nine years of cultivation, they will ascend to the Great Void, ascend to the Golden Gates, and wander and feast in the chambers of the sun and moon. To lightly divulge these treasured scripts will bring retribution upon seven generations of ancestors, and one’s own body will be destroyed, suffering the three calamities and five agonies, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas. Practitioners, be cautious.

For all who practice this Dao, on the appointed day, write the talisman, face the proper direction, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the twofold radiance of the sun and moon above your own eyes. Above them are purple and yellow *qi*, swirling like smoke, crowning and enveloping your entire body. Then draw in the light of the sun and moon, and the purple and yellow *qi*, swallowing fifty times, and swallowing saliva ten times to conclude.

Softly recite the incantation:
The Eight Numinous revolve the mysterious net,
The Twofold Radiance returns to the Great Void.
The Three Dawns share the numinous brilliance,
The Seven Essences blaze with eightfold rays.
Refined and transformed above the Golden Gate,
Bathed in the Eastern Well.
Flowing splendor veils the cavern wilds,
Stone radiance scatters in the Upper Palace.
Essence sprinkles beyond the Nine Heavens,
Vast mushrooms irrigate the ten directions.
I look up to feast on the Eightfold Pure *qi*,
Riding the heavens to gather the Flying Sovereign.
Spirits descend, the six viscera flourish,
Returned form gleams with golden countenance.
Long preserve the root of the sun and moon,
For ten thousand kalpas without end.

Conclude, then ingest the talisman. In practicing this Dao, avoid defilement. If this prohibition is violated, take a grain of true cinnabar, cast it into water, and bathe yourself before proceeding.

This is the secret Dao of the Upper Perfected. If divulged, the Dao departs; if kept hidden, the Dao abides. Those who study and cultivate must keep it secret to attain the rank of Upper Clarity immortal.

For all who study and obtain this method: if you can maintain a long fast and endure hardship, you will ascend to the mysterious by counting the days. If you possess this scripture but fail to diligently cultivate, think of the true, and contemplate the numinous—no different from the vulgar—you will not lose the hidden existence of a lower immortal, achieving corpse-liberation in broad daylight. When your life passes to the Great Yin beneath the earth, you may leave your bones to transform in the Southern Palace, for you must have a record in the bone register to obtain this scripture and ultimately become a divine immortal.

The Most High Great Dao Jade Dawn Lord received the Ninefold Mystery Great Void Numinous Script, the method of the Sun and Moon’s Imperial Splendor, the Twelve Upper Vows of the Thearch Lord, and the *qi* of the Eight Gates’ ritual petitions of the Mysterious Mother. He reported to the Luminous Dawn of the Nine Heavens, invoking the *qi* to summon the spirits. This is the *qi* of the moon’s splendor and the sun’s radiance, reflected in the Eastern Well. Those who practice this Dao will naturally receive the descent of the Eightfold Pure *qi*, and the flying roots of the sun and moon may certainly be gathered. The Twelve Upper Vows will be fulfilled, and the Eight Gates of the Mysterious Mother will swiftly lead to the rank of immortal. Without this method, one will harm the spirit through futile effort and gain nothing in the pursuit of immortality.

If you wish to transmit this, receive the master’s oral instructions. This Dao is subtle and wondrous, not practiced in the world. Those who obtain it are all recorded in the Azure Palace before their birth, their names inscribed in the Eastern Flower, and they are destined to become Perfected of the Upper Clarity.

Regularly, on the ninth day of the first month, the eighth day of the second month, the seventh day of the third month, the sixth day of the fourth month, the fifth day of the fifth month, the fourth day of the sixth month, the third day of the seventh month, the second day of the eighth month, the first day of the ninth month, the tenth day of the tenth month, the eleventh day of the eleventh month, and the twelfth day of the twelfth month—twelve days in a year—bathe, purify, and fast. At midnight, in a secluded chamber, ensure all is quiet and undisturbed, with no sound of people or dogs. Then arrange the eight positions. Place an eight-foot-four-inch purple-woven mat, with white cogon grass as a mat beneath. At each position, set three trays of incense, cakes, jujubes, and fruit, with one incense burner before each position. For eight positions, there are eight incense burners.

Inscribe eight bamboo slips and place them at the eight directions to invoke the officials of the Nine Heavens’ Luminous Morn.

The first slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Purple Dao of the Void Sovereign, Supreme Dao Lord, riding a single-scene chariot of eightfold primordial purple clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May Jia be granted to dwell eternally with the Mysterious Mother amidst the qi of life, reverently partaking of the eightfold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the northwest position.

The second slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Winged Sun of the Void Sovereign, Supreme Dao Lord, riding a two-scene chariot of sevenfold primordial crimson clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May Jia be granted to abide with the Mysterious Mother between the sun and moon, reverently partaking of the sevenfold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the due north position.

The third slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Prosperous Yang of the Void Sovereign, Lofty Yuan Lord, riding a three-scene chariot of sixfold primordial red clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to preserve with the Mysterious Mother amidst the Nine Heavens, reverently partaking of the sixfold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the northeast position.

The fourth slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Sevenfold Stillness of the Life-Guiding Supreme Void Sovereign, riding a four-scene chariot of fivefold primordial blue-green clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to feast with the Mysterious Mother amidst the natural, reverently partaking of the fourfold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the due east position.

The fifth slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Supreme Luminance of the Void Sovereign, Cavernous Purity Lord, riding a five-scene chariot of fourfold primordial yellow clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to drink with the Mysterious Mother amidst the Gourd River, reverently partaking of the fourfold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the southeast position.

The sixth slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Primordial Origin of the Void Sovereign, Supreme Empyrean Lord, riding a six-scene chariot of threefold primordial green clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to rest with the Mysterious Mother amidst the Jade Perfection, reverently partaking of the threefold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the due south position.

The seventh slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Sevenfold Contemplation of the Unborn Void Sovereign, Golden Numen Lord, riding a seven-scene chariot of twofold primordial purple clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to repose with the Mysterious Mother amidst the immortal’s hall, reverently partaking of the twofold primordial flying essence and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Grand Purity."*

Write this in green ink on a bamboo slip and place it at the southwest position.

The eighth slip reads: *"Nine Heavens’ Primordial Jade Purity, Eightfold Contemplation of the Lofty Void Sovereign, Pure Radiance Lord, riding an eight-scene chariot of singular primordial numinous clouds, turning the canopy of the Luminous Morn, descending to attend the rites of Wang Jia. May so-and-so be granted to wander with the Mysterious Mother amidst the Three Mysteries, reverently partaking of the singular primordial flying clouds and the root of the sun and moon’s imperial radiance. By the twelve supreme vows, may he swiftly attain flight as an immortal and wander the Jade Purity."*

Write this in green ink on bamboo slips, each one foot and two inches in length, and place them at the seats of the eight positions to manifest the summoning of spirits through the qi of the ritual.

Outside the eight positions, face north and click the teeth thirty-six times, intoning: *"I, Wang Jia, Master of the Sacred Peak, respectfully perform this pure fast and ritual offering on this auspicious morn. May the divine canopy turn and the numinous light curve to reflect, descending the eightfold primordial qi to alight upon this cinnabar heart. May all see the descent of the positions and bestow the gift of immortality."*

Then, facing northwest, bow twice, kneel, and read the first slip to completion. Proceed to invoke the Eightfold Primordial Subtle Azure Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the single-scene chariot of eightfold primordial purple clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Next, facing due north, bow twice, kneel, and read the second slip to completion. Invoke the Sevenfold Primordial Subtle Vermilion Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the two-scene chariot of sevenfold primordial crimson clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Then, facing northeast, bow twice, kneel, and read the third slip to completion. Invoke the Sixfold Primordial Subtle White Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the three-scene chariot of sixfold primordial red clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Next, facing due east, bow twice, kneel, and read the fourth slip to completion. Invoke the Fivefold Primordial Subtle Black Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the four-scene chariot of fivefold primordial blue-green clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Then, facing southeast, bow twice, kneel, and read the fifth slip to completion. Invoke the Fourfold Primordial Subtle Supreme Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the five-scene chariot of fourfold primordial yellow clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Invoke the Threefold Primordial Subtle Central Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the six-scene chariot of threefold primordial green clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Next, facing southwest, bow twice, kneel, and read the seventh slip to completion. Invoke the Twofold Primordial Proclaiming Subtle Lower Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the seven-scene chariot of twofold primordial purple clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Next, facing due west, bow twice, kneel, and read the eighth slip to completion. Invoke the Onefold Primordial Cavern-Subtle True Emperor of the Luminous Morn, beseeching his descent to the ritual position to bestow upon Jia the attainment of immortality, that he may ride the human-scene chariot of onefold primordial numinous clouds and ascend to the Jade Purity to pay homage to the Nine Heavens.

Having invoked all Eight Emperors, turn again to face north, close your eyes, and inwardly visualize: within the chamber, eightfold primordial clouds arise, dense and billowing, filling the room and encircling your body. Then, knock your teeth together thirty-six times, and raise your head to draw in the cloud-qi, swallowing twenty-four times before ceasing.

Recite the prayer:
On this auspicious day and propitious hour,
The eightfold Dao’s qi is limpid and clear.
Subtle dawn rides the revolving cycles,
Streaming rosy clouds illumine the Purple Court.
Primordial scenes gleam through the Great Void,
Reining swift chariots of green.
Flying roots refine the eight directions,
August blossoms refine the soul’s essence.
The two images spout wondrous nectar,
Flowing fragrance irrigates the Great Obscurity.
The Dark Mother binds the highest vow,
Eight slips present cinnabar sincerity.
The ritual feast summons the gods to partake,
Gazing upward to the eightfold primordial clouds.
The numinous descends ere the day’s end,
Swiftly the mysterious light pours forth.
With this vow, ascend the Jade Palace,
Compose the ode in the Eastern Flower Court.
Bestow the eight-scene chariot,
Primordial numina gird the flying carriage.
Refine your thoughts to perceive the mysterious resonance,
May this vow not harm my life.

When finished, face north and bow nine times to conclude.

For the remainder of the ritual, one must not recklessly share its offerings with outsiders. Perform this rite twelve times a year for three years, after which no further practice is required.

This Dao is most secret and not circulated in the world. Though one may study all scriptures, prepare talismans, and swallow qi, without offering this ritual to the Luminous Morn, the perfected will not descend, thoughts will not ascend in resonance, and all toil and devotion will waste one’s spirit and dissipate one’s qi, yielding no benefit in the pursuit of immortality.

Those who obtain this method and perform the ritual for three years as prescribed will move the Nine Heavens to joy and delight the Eight Primordials. The divine perfected will respond and descend, and after eight years, one will attain the ability to ride the chariot and ascend lightly into the vastness of the Great Void.

The ancient perfected ones’ ritual methods employed golden liquor and jade blossoms, but as these are no longer found in the world, rare fruits and exquisite delicacies may suffice to move the divine perfected.

The August Lord opened the path of goodness, wishing to enact the eight slips precisely to concentrate the divine perfected and hope for the descent of the numinous immortals. Even now, the immortals of the Five Peaks and the divine maidens of the Divine Continent still pour golden liquor and arrange jade blossoms, uttering great vows, presenting the eight slips, awaiting the Primordial Simplicity, revering the Three Origins, aspiring to the Luminous Morn, becoming Jade Perfected, liberating the seven ancestors, and entering the Broad Cold Palace—how much more should those of the world’s vulgar and base, the humble and defiled, not abandon this practice upon hearing of it?

Though form and spirit may accumulate goodness through countless lives, if the seven generations bear unresolved transgressions, one will still have no hope of immortality. One must make great vows, present the eight slips, offer ritual fruits, hope for the descent of the gods, and release the roots of past karma, that the body may attain deathlessness and surely become one of the highest immortals.

Those without predestined affinity for immortality, whose names are not carved in the Upper Palace, will never behold this text. Those who obtain the divine scripture will be granted twelve Jade Lads and twelve Jade Maidens to attend and guard the divine perfected. Should one violate the prohibition against leakage, the transgressor will be punished with wind-knives, the seven ancestors will bear the blame, carrying stones to build mountains, enduring the three paths and five sufferings for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. Let practitioners be cautious.

When cultivating the Dao of the Eight Primordials and practicing the method of the eight slips, always enter the chamber at dawn on the days of the Beginning of Spring and Beginning of Autumn, face north, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Primordial Simplicity’s First Sovereign: her head crowned with the essence of the sun’s circular radiance and jeweled splendor, her body clad in cloud-light and cloud-patterned primordial silk. Then visualize the Primordial Simplicity’s Second Sovereign: her head crowned with the essence of the moon’s pearl-like radiance and nightly splendor, her body clad in purple-light cloud robes and primordial silk. The two Primordials together ride clouds of purple and green, flying chariots with jade wheels, twelve phoenixes following. From the Upper Palace, thirty-six Jade Maidens accompany them, circling above the Jade Purity as they journey toward the northeast.

Then bow eight times, knock the head eight times, and beat the cheeks eight times, softly reciting the prayer:
The Two Numinous Ones of the Great Beginning,
Primordial qi lofty and luminous,
Circling the jade chariot,
On this auspicious day journeying in purity,
Above, the divine light ascends,
Below, it illumines my form.
Connect my nine origins,
Descend to me the eight essences.
The four convergences interpenetrate,
Five treasures give birth to clouds.
May I ride the one-scene chariot,
Ascend to the Jade Court,
Bow to the Primordial Simplicity,
Receive the immortal’s primordial numina.

When finished, raise the head and swallow eight times.

On the days of the Spring Equinox and Autumn Equinox, enter the chamber at the meal hour, face east, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Primordial Obscurity’s First Sovereign: her head crowned with the essence of the azure radiance of the Year Star’s nine qi, her body clad in flying clouds and ninefold-transforming primordial silk. Then visualize the Primordial Obscurity’s Second Sovereign: her head crowned with the essence of the white radiance of the Grand White Star’s primordial splendor, her body clad in flowing-light flying clouds and primordial robes. The two Primordials together ride clouds of dark and yellow, flying chariots with feathered canopies, twenty-four phoenixes following. From the Primordial Numinous Palace, thirty-six Jade Maidens accompany them, circling within the Jade Void as they journey toward the southeast.

Then bow four times, knock the head four times, and beat the cheeks four times, softly reciting the prayer:
The Two Scenes of the Primordial Obscurity,
Lofty and revered primordial divinities,
Transforming qi and dispersing numina,
Soaring through the Golden Gate.
The Purple Void wields the reins,
Five numina flank the chariot,
Circling the Flower Court,
Illuminating the nine clouds through the void.
On this auspicious day,
The Celestial Origin unfolds its array,
Myriad blessings converge,
My vow arises naturally.
From the Highest, the flowing descends,
Eternally preserving my primordial truth.
Riding the scene, flying through space,
Ascending into the Jade Morn,
Bowing to the Highest Obscurity,
Receiving the transformation of the highest immortals.

When finished, raise the head and swallow the eight qi to conclude.

On the days of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer) and *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter), enter the chamber at noon, face the southeast, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Purple Primordial Sovereign, her head crowned with the radiant essence of the Cinnabar Origin and the Eight Luminous Stars, clad in a sash of dark and yellow nine-colored plain silk. Visualize the Yellow Primordial Sovereign, her head crowned with the quintessential essence of the Dark Morn and the Morning Star, clad in a sash of flying-cloud seamless plain brocade. The two Primordial Sovereigns together ride clouds of purple and azure, their jade wheels and chariots framed by nine dragons, attended by twenty-four jade maidens of the Upper Palace. They circle above the Purple Void, journeying eastward. Then bow twice, knock the head twice, and beat the cheeks twice, softly reciting the prayer:

Purple and Yellow Void Numinous,
Two Primordial Sovereigns of lofty perfection,
Riding the void and descending with the scene,
Whistling the wind and summoning the mist,
Wandering the Jade Clarity,
Gazing through the Purple Heavens,
Primal blessings in supreme auspiciousness,
High sages unfurl their array,
Flowing essence by the billions,
Purifying streams by the thousands,
Below embracing the boundless,
Above pervading the Nine Mysteries,
Bestow upon me the Eight Scenes,
To ascend in flight without hindrance,
To shine with the sun’s radiance,
To endure with the moon’s years.

When finished, raise the head and swallow the eight qi to conclude.

On the days of *Xiazhi* (Summer Solstice) and *Dongzhi* (Winter Solstice), enter the chamber at dusk, face west, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the White Primordial Sovereign, her head crowned with the threefold luminous essence of the Yellow Origin and the Quelling Star, clad in a robe of yellow-green cloud-patterned radiance. Visualize the Flying Primordial Sovereign, her head crowned with the flowing light of the Seven Luminaries and the Purple Origin, clad in a seven-colored cloud-silk plain gown. The two Primordial Sovereigns together ride clouds of azure rainbow, their flying jade canopies and purple parasols drawn by twelve winged unicorns, attended by thirty-two jade maidens of the Great Flower. They circle above the Cavern Clarity, journeying southwest. Then bow six times, knock the head six times, and beat the cheeks six times, reciting the prayer:

Flying Scenes and Eight Primordials,
White Origin knits its essence,
Primal qi conjoins in blessing,
Merging with the Highest Clarity,
Flowing clouds of two hues,
Illuminating the numinous court of the heavens,
The Jade Emperor turns the reins,
Framing the Purple Jade,
Circling the Cinnabar Chamber,
Eight qi shining through the void,
Revolving through the Celestial Origin,
Gazing upon my form,
Conveying me in the cloud-wheel,
Descending to me the flying chariot,
That I may join the Eight Primordials,
Equal in scene with the true numina.

When finished, swallow the qi eight times to conclude.

This is the Dao of the Eight Primordials’ true journey and feast of scenes, the way of assembly in the Cloud Capital above. The lofty numinous names are transmitted orally, mouth to mouth. Without the golden script of green characters, or one’s name inscribed in the Mysterious Chart, one may not partake in its hearing. Those who practice this method will have the Eight Primordials attend their chamber. After eight years, the eight palaces will naturally become luminous, and one may ride the void and ascend the clouds, roaming the Highest Clarity.

Whenever transmitting the *True Scripture of the Eight Primordials*, master and disciple must fast together for a hundred days—or thirty days at least—presenting eight taels of refined gold, thirty feet each of five-colored silk, and a set of ritual robes, to pledge the covenant of the Nine Heavens’ oath-bound spirits. To receive the inner names of the Eight Primordials, present twenty-two feet of silk inscribed with characters, to swear the oath before the Treasure Perfected. Without this offering, one may not recklessly reveal the names of the Eight Primordials. To lightly divulge the lofty numina is to condemn nine generations to retribution. Both transmitter and receiver will suffer the trials of the wind-blade, the true scenes will ascend on high, and one’s efforts in study will be in vain, with no descent to one’s form. Transmit and receive with clarity and caution, as in the covenant of the Four Poles.

Here ends the *Highest Clarity Wondrous Scripture of the Eight Primordials: The Oral Instructions on Ingesting the Radiance of the Sun and Moon*.

chunks.original_text: 正一部 洞真太上八素真经服食日月皇华诀 经名：洞真太上八素真经服食日月皇华诀。 撰人不详，约出朴东晋。 原为《洞真太上八素真经诀》之一，后分出单行。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 洞真太上八素真经服食日月皇华诀 扶桑太帝，当以经传太极四真人，谘於西龟王母。 王母告太帝曰：上皇之年，所以为学得见宝文，便位登玉清者，皆由密修宝道秘灵，不宣於口，不形於人，潜感至寂，以致上真。 故道贵隐寂，化于无形，出乎无声。 自我受真经於九空，已经累亿之劫，未传三人。 至中皇元年末，乃刻北元天中录那之国，灵镜人鸟之山阇莱之岫，於灵宫之中，凝九玄正一之气，结而成字。 后圣九玄金阙帝君，来见灵文，便命仙都运笔写而盟天，修行道成，位登金阙。 高上以我轻泄天宝，削我真元之号，退降游散灵官，五百年中方得复於本真。 元始所以置四司五帝之宫，部於神兵者，正以欲检於漏泄，罚於风刀也。 如此可不慎哉。 后学如林，无一人得仙，何意？ 皆由形泄道文，流放天真，道既不降，天罚潜彰，进退失志，独死空山，徒劳无获，痛恨何言。 道非勤而不告，非密而不行，得见真经，当密行求灵，神真易感，计日成仙也。 如四极真人，备经万戒，宝道秘真，而执固灵图，神志挺拔，名刊上清，录字帝简，位登四极，授此将复何疑哉。 於是太帝以《八素真经》，依盟而传焉。 西城王君今封一通於峨媚之山，曲房之中。 《八素真经》玄文，生於太空之内，见於西龟之山，玄圃之上，积石之阴，金堂玉室之裹。 八素高玄羽章，灵文郁乎洞标，紫字焕乎琼林，神光流耀於九元，金音虚朗於紫天，丹霞罗荫於玉房，飞霄郁勃於凝真，紫凤振翮，灵风扬烟，流芬激气，洞微入玄，左运自然金童，右命太虚上仙，神妃侍卫，太华执巾，玉郎辅位，四司临轩，二景停晖，三晨回精，飞仙互骋，流曜云营，华光交焕，三烛合明，文威焕赫，气布紫庭，众真宴礼，称庆上清，斯神文之至尊，德巍巍乎高灵。 於是高上玉晨太上大道君，清斋上宫，紫金盟天，受之於九玄。 采黄华於东井，掇日根於金门，回二景以玄注，纳飞精以映颜，引太虚以为期，与三光以同年，极天号於高上，编紫录於玉晨，总万司於帝图，掌玉皇於上仙，服八素於日月，诵玉章以转神，期灵真以自娱，经万劫而不传。 此道飞空步虚，超腾上真之妙法，当传得道有骨录，应为真人者。 学仙之士，百万之夫，无有一人能得见其篇目者。 上天金阙、方诸青府及地宫，皆逆刻简於未生之前，当得受於真经尔。 得者便补上真，为万仙之宗师也。 元始以经传高上玉皇、九天帝王、九天丈人，於空玄之中，表之於西龟之山，玄授於西王母。 太上大道君受之於九玄，以传扶桑太帝君。 金阙帝君受之於北元，以传上相青童君，太帝以传四极真人。 玄古之道，气气相胤，真真相传。 上相撰集，以编灵文，秘於九天之上大有之宫，侍卫玉童、玉女各七百人。 依科七百年中，有真人听传。 四司以五帝神兵七百人，纠罚漏泄。 有得此经，不依科而妄传，七祖充责，身死九泉。 日精赤，圆形而方景，其气有衰盛，运度潜亏。 常以月生三日、九日、十七日、二十一日、二十五日，一月五过，於金门之上，以金精石景水母芝英，炼於日魂耀精八芒也。

**The Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences: Oral Instructions on Ingesting the Radiant Flower of the Sun and Moon**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences: Oral Instructions on Ingesting the Radiant Flower of the Sun and Moon*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. Originally part of *The Oral Instructions on the Supreme Cavern-Real Perfection Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences*, later separated into an independent text. One scroll. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Section Zheng Yi.

---

The Great Emperor of Fusang received the transmission of this scripture from the Four Perfected Ones of the Great Ultimate, who consulted the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise. The Queen Mother addressed the Great Emperor, saying:

"In the era of the Supreme August, those who studied and beheld the treasure scriptures, ascending to the Jade Purity Heaven, all achieved this through the secret cultivation of the precious Dao and the concealment of its numinous mysteries—unspoken by mouth, unmanifest in form, silently resonating with the utmost stillness to attain the Perfected Ones above. Thus, the Dao values concealment and stillness, transforming without form, emerging without sound.

Since I received the true scripture from the Nine Void-Heavens, countless eons have passed, yet it has been transmitted to fewer than three. By the end of the Central August Prime, it was inscribed in the nation of Luona within the Northern Prime Heaven, upon the Lingjing Mountain of the Bird of Renown in the Jialai Grotto, within the Numinous Palace. There, the qi of the Nine Mysteries and the Orthodox Unity congealed into characters.

Later, the Sage Lord of the Nine Mysteries and Golden Portal beheld the numinous text and commanded the Immortal Capital to transcribe it with a covenant sworn to Heaven. Through cultivation, he attained the Dao and ascended to the Golden Portal. The Most High, deeming me reckless in divulging celestial treasures, stripped me of my true primordial title and demoted me to a wandering spirit-official. Only after five hundred years was I restored to my original perfection.

Thus, the Primordial Beginning established the Four Offices and the Five Thearchs’ palaces, deploying divine soldiers precisely to inspect leaks and punish with the Wind Blade. How could one not be cautious?

Later disciples flourished like a forest, yet not one attained immortality. Why? All suffered from revealing the scriptural texts, scattering the celestial perfected ones. The Dao ceased to descend, and heavenly punishments silently manifested. Advancing or retreating, they lost their resolve, perishing alone in empty mountains—laboring in vain, their regret beyond words.

The Dao does not reveal itself without diligence, nor does it flourish without secrecy. Those who behold the true scriptures must cultivate in secret to seek the numinous. The divine and the perfected respond readily, and ascension to immortality may be calculated by days.

Consider the Four Poles Perfected Ones: they mastered myriad precepts, treasured the Dao, and concealed its mysteries. Firmly grasping the numinous charts, their spirit and will stood resolute. Their names were inscribed in the Upper Clarity, their characters recorded in the Emperor’s Register. They ascended to the Four Poles—what doubt remains in receiving this transmission?

Thereupon, the Great Emperor transmitted *The Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences* in accordance with the covenant.

The Lord of the Western City now seals one copy within the Emei Mountains, in the secluded chamber.

The mysterious text of *The Scripture of the Eight Pure Essences* was born within the Great Void, manifesting upon the Western Tortoise Mountain, above the Mystic Garden, in the shade of the Accumulated Stones, within the Golden Hall and Jade Chamber. The Eight Pure Essences’ lofty and mysterious feathered chapters, their numinous texts dense as cavern peaks, their purple characters gleaming like a forest of jade, their divine radiance flowing through the Nine Primes, their golden tones resonating in the Purple Heaven, crimson auroras veiling the Jade Chamber, soaring mists surging in the congealed perfection—purple phoenixes flapping their wings, numinous winds wafting incense, fragrant qi streaming, penetrating the subtle to enter the mysterious. To the left, the spontaneous Golden Lads revolve; to the right, the Supreme Void Immortals are summoned. Divine consorts attend, the Great Flower holds the towel, Jade Lads assist in rank, the Four Offices approach the hall, the Two Effulgences pause their brilliance, the Three Dawns return their essence. Flying immortals gallop in turn, streaming luminosities encamp like clouds, radiant flowers intermingle, the Three Candles merge their light. The majesty of the text blazes, qi spreads through the Purple Court. The assembled perfected ones feast and offer rites, celebrating the Upper Clarity. This is the supreme of numinous texts, its virtue towering and lofty above the high spirits.

Thereupon, the Most High Jade Dawn Supreme Lord of the Great Dao fasted in the Upper Palace, swore a covenant to the Purple Gold Heaven, and received it from the Nine Mysteries. He gathered the Yellow Flower from the Eastern Well, plucked the Sun Root at the Golden Gate, revolved the Two Effulgences to infuse the mysterious, absorbed the flying essence to illuminate his countenance. Drawing the Great Void as his term, he matched the Three Luminaries in longevity, his celestial title exalted in the Most High, his purple record compiled in the Jade Dawn. He governed the myriad offices in the Emperor’s Chart, presided over the Jade Thearch among the Upper Immortals, ingested the Eight Pure Essences from the sun and moon, recited the jade chapters to revolve his spirit, and awaited the numinous perfected ones for his own delight. The scripture remained untransmitted for ten thousand eons.

This Dao is the wondrous method of soaring through empty space and treading the void to transcend the Upper Perfected. It should be transmitted only to those with the bone-record of attainment, destined to become Perfected Ones.

Among the millions of aspiring immortals, not one has glimpsed its chapters. The Golden Portal of Heaven, the Azure Mansion of the Square Cauldron, and the Earthly Palaces all inscribe their registers in reverse before birth—only then may one receive the true scripture.

Those who obtain it immediately become Upper Perfected Ones and the patriarchs of the ten thousand immortals.

The Primordial Beginning transmitted the scripture to the Most High Jade Thearch, the Nine Heavenly Thearchs, and the Nine Heavenly Elders in the Empty Mystery, displaying it upon the Western Tortoise Mountain and mystically bestowing it upon the Queen Mother of the West. The Supreme Lord of the Great Dao received it from the Nine Mysteries and transmitted it to the Great Emperor Lord of Fusang. The Golden Portal Thearch received it from the Northern Prime and transmitted it to the Prime Minister Lord Azure Lad. The Great Emperor transmitted it to the Four Poles Perfected Ones.

The Dao of the Mystic Antiquity is transmitted from qi to qi, from perfection to perfection.

The Prime Minister compiled and edited the numinous text, concealing it in the Great Existence Palace above the Nine Heavens, guarded by seven hundred Jade Lads and Jade Maidens. According to the statutes, after seven hundred years, a Perfected One may receive its transmission. The Four Offices, with the Five Thearchs’ divine soldiers—seven hundred in number—punish leaks and divulgence.

Those who obtain this scripture and recklessly transmit it without following the statutes will have their seven ancestors held accountable, and their own bodies will perish in the Nine Springs.

The essence of the sun is red, round in form yet square in its luminous trace. Its qi waxes and wanes, its revolutions subtly diminish. Always, on the third, ninth, seventeenth, twenty-first, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month—five times monthly—atop the Golden Gate, refine the Eight Rays of the Sun’s Soul and Radiant Essence with the Golden Essence, Stone Luminous Water, and the Mother of Mushroom Flowers."

chunks.original_text: 当此之日，日华流散，飞根滂沱，金精盈溢，普天得润也。 夫欲求仙，当以其日采御日根，灵降玉户，精充幽关，体生奇光，与日同年。 潜行其道，升到金门。 金门在天西关之内，日月通灵之门也。 帝君名曰赤丹金精石景水母，玉胞之经。 月光黄，其气方精而圆象，运回而盈，度周而倾。 常以月五日、十五日、二十五日，经於东井之上，沐浴灵晖，莹饰精芒，鲜明皇华也。 当此之日，阳精流散，黄气内缠，皇华盈溢，普天纳真也。 夫欲求仙，当以其日采黄华於东井，服阳精於日魂，润流九孔之内，神镇五府之宫。 修行其道，上升月庭。 月魄在东井之内，则日月通辉之户也。 帝君名曰黄气阳精藏天隐月，玉胎之经也。 夫欲采日华飞根之道，未至一日，当清斋烧香，取井花之水九斗，露於中庭，书石景九炼水母玉符，置於水中，西向叩齿十二通，微祝曰： 阳明炼精，光焕紫庭，八芒朗映，魂芝溢盈，五回三转，气通太灵，流芳曲注，荫润苍生，冠带金门，华根鲜明，服御石景，水母灌精，顺天运气，随日华荣，九孔纳真，解脱本形。 毕，露水中庭一宿，到明日正中时，取所露水一升，向日服之，又叩齿二十四通，仰向日祝曰： 阳精已通，飞华已新，皇芝流溢，荫注内缠，仰餐玄润，芳华来臻，宫宅开张，荡洗嚣尘，体映玉光，面发金真，云飞羽步，上造日门。 毕，便仰向引日精四十五咽止。 以余水沐浴通身，竟还室内，西向叩齿二十四通，冥目思见日中五色流霞，皆来下接绕一身，五色流霞之中，自复有紫气大如目童者，累重数十圆，焕耀五色之内，与五气俱来下，入兆口中，便引气四十五咽。 咽毕，又咽液九过，微祝曰： 日魂流光，五色滂沱，炼魂金门，圆景峨峨，灵晖吐曜，受明天河，玉芝盈溢，兰润芳嗟，饮我皇泉，哺我飞华，掇根咽实，寿同灵柯，形附太晖，身腾飞霞，千龄万劫，使不倾差。 毕，心拜日门九过止。 此采日根飞华太阳之精，玄古妙道。 行之一年，面有玉泽，体生金光。 七年灵降，飞行日门，日中童子与兆共言。 自无金名帝图，绿字青宫，不得见其篇目。 轻泄灵文，九祖充责，己身谢愆，三徒五苦，万劫不原。 右石景九炼水母玉符，朱书青纸，着水中，兼行事之日，悉朱书青纸，西向服之一枚。 行此道，慎殗秽，勿食五荤，令五藏清香，必纳真灵也。 若天阴无日，亦於室内行之。 夫欲采月皇华之道，当以月临东井之日，清旦取井华之水一瓫，露於中庭，夜半书阳精玉胎炼仙之符，置於水中，东向叩齿二十四通，临水祝曰： 黄气阴华，阳精洞鲜，沐浴九魂，冠带金晨，圆明启告，玉胎炼仙，华光交焕，流芳淘津，九阳齐化，玄霞散烟，元景回灵、曲映我身，飞升上宫，洞观琼轩。 毕，取水一升，向月服之，便握固，存月中五色流精，皆来冠接一身，五色之中，又有月光黄气大如目童，累重数十，在月精五色之内，并从口中而入洞房，匝五藏，便向月吞精五十咽，咽液十过，又叩齿十通，微祝曰： 黄气流精，三合凝光，玄晖反正，冠带八芒，炼魂东井，受明飞皇，金华散灵，五君流芳，夫人降醴，润洒十方，洪芝下注，六腑缢充，金精九化，易景反容，乘虚落烟，游宴太空，上造月庭，与真齐双，变化八道，出有入无，二晨同晖，永保无穷。

On this day, the sun’s radiance scatters, its flying roots pour forth in torrents, and golden essence overflows, moistening all under heaven. Those who seek immortality must, on this day, gather and ingest the sun’s root. The numinous descends to the Jade Portal, essence fills the hidden passes, the body generates wondrous light, and one’s years become equal to the sun’s. Following this Way in secret, one ascends to the Golden Gate. The Golden Gate lies within the Western Pass of Heaven, the portal through which sun and moon commune with the numinous. The Thearch is named *Red Cinnabar, Golden Essence, Stone Radiance, Water Mother*—the Scripture of the Jade Womb.

The moon’s light is yellow, its qi square in essence yet round in form, revolving and waxing, its cycles complete yet ever-declining. Always on the fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month, pass above the Eastern Well, bathe in the numinous radiance, refine and adorn the essence’s brilliance, and make resplendent the imperial splendor. On this day, yang essence scatters, yellow qi coils within, imperial splendor overflows, and all under heaven receives the true. Those who seek immortality must, on this day, gather the yellow radiance above the Eastern Well, ingest the yang essence from the sun’s soul, and let it flow through the nine apertures, while the spirit guards the five palaces of the viscera. Cultivating this Way, one ascends to the Moon’s Court. The Moon’s Soul resides within the Eastern Well, the portal through which sun and moon share their radiance. The Thearch is named *Yellow Qi, Yang Essence, Hidden Heaven, Concealed Moon*—the Scripture of the Jade Embryo.

For the Way of gathering the sun’s radiance and flying roots, one day prior, purify the body, burn incense, draw nine *dou* of well-flower water, and expose it in the central courtyard. Inscribe the *Ninefold-Refined Stone Radiance, Water Mother, Jade Talisman* and place it in the water. Face west, knock the teeth twelve times, and softly intone the prayer:

*"Yang brightness refines essence,
Light illumines the Purple Court,
Eight rays shine resplendent,
Soul-mushrooms overflow.
Five revolutions, three transformations,
Qi connects with the Great Numinous.
Fragrance flows in winding streams,
Shading and moistening the living.
Adorned with the Golden Gate’s sash,
Flying roots glow fresh.
Ingesting Stone Radiance,
Water Mother irrigates essence.
Following heaven’s revolutions,
Accord with the sun’s splendor.
Nine apertures receive the true,
Liberating the original form."*

Afterward, leave the water exposed in the courtyard overnight. At noon the next day, take one *sheng* of the dew-water, face the sun, and ingest it. Knock the teeth twenty-four times, look up to the sun, and pray:

*"Yang essence now flows,
Flying radiance renewed.
Imperial mushrooms overflow,
Shade coils within.
Gazing upward, I feast on dark moisture,
Fragrant splendor arrives.
Palaces and chambers open wide,
Washing away dust and clamor.
The body reflects jade’s light,
The face emits golden truth.
Clouds soar on feathered steps,
Ascending to the Sun’s Gate."*

Afterward, face upward and draw in the sun’s essence forty-five times. Bathe the entire body with the remaining water, then return to the chamber. Face west, knock the teeth twenty-four times, close the eyes, and visualize five-colored streaming clouds descending to encircle the body. Within the five-colored clouds, a purple qi, large as an eye’s pupil, appears in layers of dozens of circles, gleaming amid the five hues. Together with the five qi, it descends and enters the adept’s mouth. Draw in the qi forty-five times, then swallow saliva nine times, and softly intone:

*"Sun’s soul scatters light,
Five colors pour in torrents.
Refining the soul at the Golden Gate,
The round radiance towers.
Numinous brilliance spills forth,
Receiving brightness from the Celestial River.
Jade mushrooms overflow,
Orchid moisture fragrant and sweet.
I drink the imperial spring,
Nurse the flying radiance.
Plucking roots, swallowing fruit,
Lifespan matches the numinous tree.
Form clings to the great radiance,
Body soars on flying clouds.
For a thousand ages, ten thousand kalpas,
Let it never falter or err."*

Afterward, bow nine times toward the Sun’s Gate. This is the Way of gathering the sun’s root, flying radiance, and the Great Yang’s essence—a wondrous and ancient Dao. Practicing it for one year, the face gains jade’s luster, and the body emits golden light. After seven years, the numinous descends, and one flies to the Sun’s Gate, where the Sun Youth speaks with the adept. Without one’s name inscribed in the Thearch’s register, written in green characters in the Azure Palace, one may not behold its chapters. To recklessly divulge this numinous text is to hold one’s nine ancestors accountable, while one’s own body suffers transgressions, enduring the Three Calamities, Five Sufferings, and ten thousand kalpas of irredeemable torment.

The *Ninefold-Refined Stone Radiance, Water Mother, Jade Talisman* is to be written in cinnabar on blue-green paper and placed in the water. On the day of practice, write it entirely in cinnabar on blue-green paper, face west, and ingest one talisman. In practicing this Way, avoid defilement and the five pungent vegetables, ensuring the five viscera remain pure and fragrant to receive the true numinous. If the sky is overcast and the sun absent, perform the practice indoors.

For the Way of gathering the moon’s imperial radiance, on the day the moon passes the Eastern Well, at dawn draw one jar of well-flower water and expose it in the central courtyard. At midnight, inscribe the *Yang Essence, Jade Embryo, Refined Immortal Talisman* and place it in the water. Face east, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and pray over the water:

*"Yellow qi, yin radiance,
Yang essence gleams bright.
Bathing the nine souls,
Adorned with the Golden Dawn’s sash.
Round brightness reveals,
Jade embryo refines immortals.
Radiance intertwines,
Fragrance washes the ford.
Nine yangs transform as one,
Dark clouds scatter mist.
Primal radiance returns the numinous,
Winding light reflects my form.
Ascending to the Upper Palace,
Gazing upon the jade pavilion."*

Afterward, take one *sheng* of the water, face the moon, and ingest it. Clench the fists, visualize the moon’s five-colored streaming essence descending to crown and encircle the body. Within the five colors, a moon’s yellow qi, large as an eye’s pupil, appears in layers of dozens, amid the moon’s five-colored essence, and enters the Grotto Chamber through the mouth, encircling the five viscera. Face the moon and swallow its essence fifty times, then swallow saliva ten times. Knock the teeth ten times and softly intone:

*"Yellow qi flows essence,
Threefold harmony congeals light.
Dark radiance returns to rectitude,
Adorned with eight rays.
Refining the soul at the Eastern Well,
Receiving brightness from the flying emperor.
Golden radiance scatters the numinous,
Five lords stream fragrance.
The Lady descends with sweet wine,
Moistening the ten directions.
Mighty mushrooms pour down,
Six palaces brim full.
Golden essence ninefold transforms,
Changing scenes, altering countenance.
Riding emptiness, descending mist,
Roaming the Great Void.
Ascending to the Moon’s Court,
Paired with the true in dual radiance.
Transforming through the eight paths,
Exiting existence, entering non-being.
Two dawns share brilliance,
Eternally preserved without end."*

When finished, rinse with the remaining water. After bathing, return to the chamber and face east to ingest the Yang Essence Jade Womb Refinement Immortal Talisman. Then knock the teeth twelve times and softly intone:

*"The hidden heavens embrace radiance,
Yellow qi thickly disperses.
Essence congeals, luminous splendor,
Eight rays gleam resplendent.
Lustrous adornments of yellow blossoms,
Stone reflections wash and irrigate.
Jade mushrooms overflow,
Moistening and filling the celestial vastness.
All under heaven receives refinement,
Dawn breaks at the morning’s first light.
Mounting the radiance, ascending the void,
Attaining the ascent to the imperial palace.
The Eternal Fire descends to the world,
Transcending the eight perils,
Sharing brilliance with the moon,
Equal in rank with the moon."*

When done, swallow qi fifty times and stop.

This is the Way of Ingesting Moonlight, the wondrous method of the Primordial Beginning. Practicing it for one year, the face will bear the luster of jade. After seven years, the numinous descends, and the body emits golden light. After nine years, one will fly and ascend to the moon’s realm, where the Moon Lad and the Five Lords, along with the Lady, will roam together with you. Without one’s name inscribed on the imperial register of the Upper Clarity, one may not partake in these mysteries. Those who practice this method may attain transcendence as an immortal. Revealing this sacred text lightly will bring seven generations of ancestors to account, and one’s own body will be consigned to the ghostly officials, forever sealed in the earthly prisons, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas.

The Yang Essence Jade Womb Refinement Immortal Talisman is written in yellow on white paper and placed in water. On the day of practice, all is written in yellow, and one faces east to ingest one talisman. If the sky is overcast and the moon is absent, practice may still be performed indoors. Missing a single day of practice will nullify a hundred days of prior effort.

For all scholars of the highest arts who gather the flying blossoms of the sun and moon: at evening repose, knock the teeth thirty-six times, clench the fists, close the eyes in darkness, and visualize the purple radiance of the sun above the left eye and the yellow qi of the moon above the right eye, shimmering and flickering, illuminating the realm of the head and face. Softly intone:

*"Dual radiance flows essence,
Light reflects my form.
Flying blossoms, imperial mushrooms,
Sweet fragrance fills and abounds.
Above, it crowns the Muddy Pellet,
Below, it spreads through the Yellow Court.
The Three Lights merge,
The Two Qi intertwine.
Eternally preserve the Crimson Palace,

The Queen Mother received them from the Nine Mysteries to draw in the essence of the flying blossoms of the Two Radiant Essences.

Thus, the Three Primordial Lords of Grand Simplicity, the Upper Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen, and the Perfected of Grand Void all practiced this Way, ascending to the rank of Highest Primordial Emperor, inscribed on the Purple Tablets of Jade Clarity, and attaining the numinous perfection of Grand Truth. This method is most wondrous and must not be transmitted to the lower world. Those who obtain it will fly through the mysterious void, ascend to the Gate of the Sun, and roam the Court of the Moon, their lifespan equal to the Two Radiant Essences, enduring as long as qi itself. Revealing this sacred text lightly will bring seven generations of ancestors to account, and one’s own body will bear the guilt, forever sealed among the ghostly officials.

Performing the rites of the Feminine Unity Jade Seal, the Mysterious Mother’s Eight Gates of Practice, the Twelve Upper Aspirations, and the offering of qi to the numinous realm in the Way of seeking immortality—without these talismans, the numinous will not descend, qi will not alight, the Way will recede into the distance, and transcendence will never be attained.

After nine years, one will converse with the Lady of the Moon, fly through the Great Void, and ascend to the Court of the Moon.

After one year, the nine orifices will become luminous. After three years, the divine blossoms will shine within. After nine years, one will unite with the Perfected in numinosity and fly to the Upper Clarity. It is also called the Celestial Luminaries of the Seven Primes.

After one year, the spirits within the five organs will transform into Perfected Ones. After seven years, they will manifest and serve as your envoys. After nine years, inner and outer will be luminously interconnected, allowing you to see within yourself, to sit in death and stand in disappearance, and to fly as an immortal. chunks.original_text: 一名九天龙虎章。 五素飞精洞天灵符，以夏至之日朱书竹膜之上，清旦南向服之，一年彻视十里，三年自知神化，九年洞睹九天，拜谒九天王，与灵通言，飞行九天。 一名九灵玉文。 四素飞精结仙玉胎金符，以立秋日黄书竹膜之上，清旦西南向服之，三年血髓凝化，九孔受真，七年形变，容如金光，九年得降飞霄，乘空而行，上造日门。 一名金光玉玉真。 三素飞精招仙上符，秋分日黄书竹膜之上，清旦西向服之，三年五岳仙官来到，上真形见，中士庵霭，若见若亡，下士梦睡，与仙共言。 九年得仙官云軿来迎，上升月庭。 一名总天元录。 二素飞精九空石景玉符，以立冬日墨书竹膜之上，清旦西北向服之，三年能晻中读书，目明通灵，见神共言。 九年日月玄晖生於五藏，通身明光，乘空飞行，与日同年。 一名玄景自然金灵。 一素飞精黄气乘天灵符，以冬至日墨书竹膜之上，清旦北向服之，三年能知九天人言，九年与八素同軿，游行太霄，宴景玉晨。 一名三景玄精金晖。 右八素飞精二景玉文，生於空洞之中，明於龟山之巅，玄圃之上，积石之阴。 万气所宗，总御诸天日月隐文，秘於九天之上，万劫一传。 有得灵文，日月同年，变化纵景，出有入无，项生紫光，面发金容，万灵稽首，十天司迎。 九年修行，飞升太空，上朝金阙，游宴日月之房。 轻泄宝文，七祖充责，己身灭亡，三徒五苦，万劫不原，奉者慎之。 凡行此道，至其日书符，向正中方，叩齿三十六通，冥目存思日月二景，在己身两目之上，上有紫黄二气，郁勃如烟，冠匝一身，便仰引日月二光，紫黄之气五十咽，咽液十过止。 微祝曰： 八灵运玄纲，二景回太空。 三晨同灵曜，七精焕八芒。 炼化金门上，沐浴东井中。 流晖翳洞野，石景散上宫。 精洒九天外，洪芝灌十方。 仰餐八素气，乘天采飞皇。 神降六胃昌，反形朗金容。 长保日月根，万劫无休终。 毕，服符止。 行此道慎殗秽，若犯此禁，当以真朱一铢，投水中，以自澣浴，然后行事。 此上真秘道，泄则道去，密则道存，修学之士，宜秘修行，克获上仙也。 凡上学之士，得有此法，若能长斋苦行，计日升玄。 若有此经，未能勤修思真念灵，与俗无别者，故不失隐存下仙，白日尸解。 及命过太阴地下主者，或遗骨胎变，受化南宫，必宿有骨录，应得此经，终归神仙故也。 太上大道玉晨君，受九玄太空灵文，日月皇华之法，帝君十二上愿，玄母八门行简醮礼之气，上告九天之明晨，醮气之招神也。 此月华日曜之气，映乎东井者也。 得行此道，八素之气自然降也，日月飞根必可采也，十二上愿克从愿也，玄母八门将刻上仙也。 学无此法，将损神於徒劳，无获於求仙。 若欲施之，受师口言，此道微妙，不行於世，得者皆青宫逆注於未生之前，定录於东华，必为上清真人者也。 常以正月九日、二月八日、三月七日、四月六日、五月五日、六月四日、七月三日、八月二日、九月一日，十月十日、十一月十一日、十二月十二日，一年十二日，沐浴清斋，夜半於密室之内，远近安定，人犬不闻，然后施行安八位。 置八方位，施二尺四寸紫纹为席，以白茅为藉，位香饼枣果三柈，一香火於位前，八位则八香火也。
