The Nine Heavens Dragon-Tiger Chapter.

Fivefold Pure Flying Essence Cavern-Heaven Numinous Talisman: On the day of the Summer Solstice, write in vermilion on bamboo membrane, face due south at dawn, and ingest it. After one year, you will see clearly for ten *li*. After three years, you will naturally know the transformations of spirit. After nine years, you will gaze through the Nine Heavens, pay homage to the Nine Heavenly Kings, converse with the numinous, and fly through the Nine Heavens. Also called the Nine Numinous Jade Script.

Fourfold Pure Flying Essence Jade Womb of Immortal Embryo Golden Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Autumn, write in yellow on bamboo membrane, face the southwest at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, blood and marrow will congeal and transform, and the nine orifices will receive the true. After seven years, your form will change, and your countenance will gleam like golden light. After nine years, you will descend to the Flying Clouds, ride the void, and ascend to the Gate of the Sun. Also called the Golden Light Jade Perfection.

Threefold Pure Flying Essence Summoning Immortal Upper Talisman: On the day of the Autumnal Equinox, write in yellow on bamboo membrane, face due west at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, the immortal officials of the Five Marchmounts will arrive, and the perfected forms of the upper adepts will appear. Middle adepts will see them as misty and indistinct, now present, now gone. Lower adepts will perceive them in dreams. You will converse with the immortals. After nine years, the immortal officials will send cloud chariots to welcome you, and you will ascend to the Moon’s Court. Also called the Comprehensive Record of the Primordial Heaven.

Twofold Pure Flying Essence Nine Orifices Stone Radiance Jade Talisman: On the day of the Beginning of Winter, write in black on bamboo membrane, face the northwest at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, you will be able to read in darkness, your eyes will be luminous and spiritually attuned, and you will see and converse with spirits. After nine years, the mysterious radiance of the sun and moon will arise within your five viscera, your entire body will shine with light, you will ride the void and fly, and your lifespan will equal that of the sun. Also called the Mysterious Radiance Spontaneous Golden Numinosity.

Onefold Pure Flying Essence Yellow Qi Ascending Heaven Numinous Talisman: On the day of the Winter Solstice, write in black on bamboo membrane, face due north at dawn, and ingest it. After three years, you will understand the speech of the people of the Nine Heavens. After nine years, you will share a chariot with the Eight Purities, roam the Great Empyrean, and feast in the radiance of the Jade Dawn. Also called the Threefold Radiance Mysterious Essence Golden Splendor.

The above Eightfold Pure Flying Essence Twofold Radiance Jade Scripts are born within the Cavernous Void, luminous atop Tortoise Mountain’s peak, above the Dark Garden, and in the shade of the Accumulated Stones. They are the origin of the ten thousand *qi*, governing all the hidden scripts of the heavens, sun, and moon, and are concealed above the Nine Heavens, transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who obtain these numinous scripts will share the lifespan of the sun and moon, transform and roam at will, emerge from being and enter non-being, their necks radiating purple light, their faces emitting golden countenances. The ten thousand spirits will bow in reverence, and the officials of the Ten Heavens will welcome them. After nine years of cultivation, they will ascend to the Great Void, ascend to the Golden Gates, and wander and feast in the chambers of the sun and moon. To lightly divulge these treasured scripts will bring retribution upon seven generations of ancestors, and one’s own body will be destroyed, suffering the three calamities and five agonies, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas. Practitioners, be cautious.

For all who practice this Dao, on the appointed day, write the talisman, face the proper direction, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the twofold radiance of the sun and moon above your own eyes. Above them are purple and yellow *qi*, swirling like smoke, crowning and enveloping your entire body. Then draw in the light of the sun and moon, and the purple and yellow *qi*, swallowing fifty times, and swallowing saliva ten times to conclude.

Softly recite the incantation:
The Eight Numinous revolve the mysterious net,
The Twofold Radiance returns to the Great Void.
The Three Dawns share the numinous brilliance,
The Seven Essences blaze with eightfold rays.
Refined and transformed above the Golden Gate,
Bathed in the Eastern Well.
Flowing splendor veils the cavern wilds,
Stone radiance scatters in the Upper Palace.
Essence sprinkles beyond the Nine Heavens,
Vast mushrooms irrigate the ten directions.
I look up to feast on the Eightfold Pure *qi*,
Riding the heavens to gather the Flying Sovereign.
Spirits descend, the six viscera flourish,
Returned form gleams with golden countenance.
Long preserve the root of the sun and moon,
For ten thousand kalpas without end.

Conclude, then ingest the talisman. In practicing this Dao, avoid defilement. If this prohibition is violated, take a grain of true cinnabar, cast it into water, and bathe yourself before proceeding.

This is the secret Dao of the Upper Perfected. If divulged, the Dao departs; if kept hidden, the Dao abides. Those who study and cultivate must keep it secret to attain the rank of Upper Clarity immortal.

For all who study and obtain this method: if you can maintain a long fast and endure hardship, you will ascend to the mysterious by counting the days. If you possess this scripture but fail to diligently cultivate, think of the true, and contemplate the numinous—no different from the vulgar—you will not lose the hidden existence of a lower immortal, achieving corpse-liberation in broad daylight. When your life passes to the Great Yin beneath the earth, you may leave your bones to transform in the Southern Palace, for you must have a record in the bone register to obtain this scripture and ultimately become a divine immortal.

The Most High Great Dao Jade Dawn Lord received the Ninefold Mystery Great Void Numinous Script, the method of the Sun and Moon’s Imperial Splendor, the Twelve Upper Vows of the Thearch Lord, and the *qi* of the Eight Gates’ ritual petitions of the Mysterious Mother. He reported to the Luminous Dawn of the Nine Heavens, invoking the *qi* to summon the spirits. This is the *qi* of the moon’s splendor and the sun’s radiance, reflected in the Eastern Well. Those who practice this Dao will naturally receive the descent of the Eightfold Pure *qi*, and the flying roots of the sun and moon may certainly be gathered. The Twelve Upper Vows will be fulfilled, and the Eight Gates of the Mysterious Mother will swiftly lead to the rank of immortal. Without this method, one will harm the spirit through futile effort and gain nothing in the pursuit of immortality.

If you wish to transmit this, receive the master’s oral instructions. This Dao is subtle and wondrous, not practiced in the world. Those who obtain it are all recorded in the Azure Palace before their birth, their names inscribed in the Eastern Flower, and they are destined to become Perfected of the Upper Clarity.

Regularly, on the ninth day of the first month, the eighth day of the second month, the seventh day of the third month, the sixth day of the fourth month, the fifth day of the fifth month, the fourth day of the sixth month, the third day of the seventh month, the second day of the eighth month, the first day of the ninth month, the tenth day of the tenth month, the eleventh day of the eleventh month, and the twelfth day of the twelfth month—twelve days in a year—bathe, purify, and fast. At midnight, in a secluded chamber, ensure all is quiet and undisturbed, with no sound of people or dogs. Then arrange the eight positions. Place an eight-foot-four-inch purple-woven mat, with white cogon grass as a mat beneath. At each position, set three trays of incense, cakes, jujubes, and fruit, with one incense burner before each position. For eight positions, there are eight incense burners.

chunks.original_text: 书八 简置八方，以请九天明晨之官。 第一简曰：九天元始玉清紫道虚皇上道君，驾一景之舆八素紫云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使甲得长与玄母俱生於生气之间，仰服八素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置西北位。 第二简曰：九天元始玉清翼日虚皇上道君，驾二景之舆七素绛云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使甲得与玄母俱存日月之间，仰服七素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置正北位。 第三简曰：九天元始玉清昌阳姬虚皇高元君，驾三舆六素红云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱保於九天之间，仰服六素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置东北位。 第四简曰：九天元始玉清七静导生高上虚皇君，驾四景之舆五素青云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱食自然之间，仰服四素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置正东位。 第五简曰：九天元始玉清太明虚皇洞清君，驾五景之舆四素黄云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱饮匏河之间，仰服四素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置东南位。 第六简曰：九天元始玉清始元虚皇太霄君，驾六景之舆三素绿云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱息於玉真之间，仰服三素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置正南位。 第七简曰：九天元始玉清七观无生虚皇金灵君，驾七景之舆二素紫云，回明晨之盖； 下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱寝於仙堂之间，仰服二素飞精日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行太清。 青书竹简上，置西南位。 第八简曰：九天元始玉清八观高元虚皇淳景君，驾八景之舆一素灵云，回明晨之盖，下降王甲醮礼，愿使某得与玄母俱游三玄之间，仰服一素飞云日月皇华之根，十二上愿，早得飞仙，游行玉清。 青书竹简上，置正西位。 右玄母八再行简，以请九天明晨之气，服御八景飞精日月皇华，求仙之道。 青笔书竹简之上，令长一尺二寸，以置八位之坐，示醮礼气之招神矣。 於八位外，北向叩齿三十六通，称某岳先生王甲，谨以吉晨，清斋奉醮礼，上迂神盖回灵曲映，降八素之气，下临丹心，咸见降位，赐丐神仙。 次向西北再拜，长跪读第一简竟，便奉请八素希微苍帝明晨道君，下降醮位，赐甲神仙，得乘一景之舆八素紫云，上升玉清，朝礼九天。 次向正北再拜，长跪读第二简竟，奉请七素中微赤帝明晨道君，下降醮位，赐甲神仙，得乘二景之舆七素绛云，上升玉清，朝礼九天。 次向东北再拜，长跪读第三简竟，奉请六素紫微白帝明晨道君，下降醮位，赐甲神仙，得乘三景之舆六素红云，上升玉清，朝礼九天 次东向一再拜，长跪读第四简竟，奉五素玄微黑帝明晨道君，下降醮位，赐甲神仙，得乘四景之舆五素青云，上升玉清，朝礼九天 次东南向再拜，长跪读第五简竟，奉请四素始微上帝明晨道君，下降醮位，赐甲神仙，得乘五景之舆四素黄云，上升玉清，朝礼九天。
